text.head: Maroochydore
text.p: Maroochydore is a city on the Sunshine Coast of Queensland.
text.head: Get in
text.p: See Sunshine Coast guide for how to get into the region.
text.head: By car
text.p: Car is by far the easiest way to see most attractions in a short amount of time, or at your own pace. Larger car hire companies may offer relocations to Brisbane Airport or the Gold Coast. Try the major national renters with services at Maroochy Airport or other local independents that hire new cars.
text.head: By public transport
text.p: The Sunshine Coast is part of the south east Queensland translink area. Sunshine Plaza is a hub for the bus services in the area.
text.head: See
Do

list.item: Walk across the Maroochy River bridge to Chambers Island
Marcoola Markets, 10 Lorraine Avenue, Marcoola. Farmer's market with street food and music. Held every Fridays from 4pm to 8pm.

text.head: Shopping centres

list.item: Sunshine Plaza, Horton Parade, ☏ +61 -7-5443-4133 . A shopping mall with large outdoor areas around a waterway. Normal chain stores are represented, but there are also paddle boats and quite a few eateries alfresco style.

text.head: Eat
Drink

list.item: Pig 'N' Whistle Sunshine Plaza. Brews their own IPA, available on tap. A rare find in Australia.

text.head: Budget

list.item: Banyandah Towers, 150 Duporth Ave., ☏ +61 7 5443-6911 . 3.5 star apartment

text.head: Mid-range

list.item: Maroochy River Resort & Bungalows (Maroochy River Bungalows), 38-46 David Low Way, Maroochydore (behind the Waterfront Hotel & BWS), ☏ +61 7 5448 4911 . Check-in: 2PM, check-out: 10AM. Self contained family holiday cabins. Private boat ramp, kayaks, tennis, bbqs, pools, sunlounges. Close to the action but away from the rat race. $350-1400 per week.
The Sebel Maroochydore, 20 Aerodrome Road, ☏ +61 7 5479 8000 . Apartment-style accommodation on Maroochydore beach, views of the beach, river and hinterland.

text.head: Connect
text.p: There is free internet at the Library.
